description: elderly woman with high forehead and hair parted at center; red lips and black teeth; has floral design on black cloth bag
text: This mask is used only for the No_ play "Yamauba," to portray the ancient female spirit of the mountains. Living in the wild, Yamauba has a coarse expression and sharp features; the inlaid metallic eyes indicate her supernatural nature. This mask is worn with a great shaggy white wig, further contributing to its unrefined effect.
title: Yamauba (Mountain Woman)
